metadata.title: Cyqle | The P2P Cloud Desktop for Instant Collaboration
metadata.description: A persistent cloud computer for your team to build, test, and automate together.

hero.title: The P2P Cloud Desktop
hero.description: A persistent cloud desktop for collaboration and AI-driven automation.

aiAutomation.title: Integrated Automation
aiAutomation.description: Your cloud desktop comes with built-in recording capabilities. Automate repetitive UI tasks effortlessly.

multiCursor.title: True Multiplayer Control
multiCursor.description: Work in parallel, not in turns. Every user gets their own cursor and keyboard input for simultaneous collaboration.

cloudNative.title: Flexible Persistence
cloudNative.description: Ephemeral by default for fresh starts, or optionally persistent to pause and resume anywhere.

collaboration.title: P2P Real-Time Sync
collaboration.description: Direct peer-to-peer streaming ensures fluid collaboration. Share your screen and controls securely.

rootAccess.title: Full Admin Privileges
rootAccess.description: It's your machine. Get full root access to install any tool, library, or dependency your workflow requires.

dataPrivacy.title: Session-Scoped Encryption
dataPrivacy.description: Your filesystem is encrypted on-the-fly with unique keys. When you close an ephemeral session, the data is gone forever.

instantEnvironments.title: Instant Provisioning
instantEnvironments.description: Spin up isolated, fully configured desktop environments for demos, testing, or development in seconds.

apiAccess.title: API Access
apiAccess.description: Programmatically spawn sessions, run commands, and manage your infrastructure via our robust API.

snapshots.title: Snapshots & Templates
snapshots.description: Create reusable snapshots of your environment. Share templates to standardize development across your team.

development.title: Remote Development
development.description: Code on a persistent cloud environment. Pair program in real-time and keep environments consistent.

qa.title: QA & Testing
qa.description: Reproduce bugs in a shared, clean environment. Invite devs to your session to debug instantly.

customerSupport.title: Collaborative Support
customerSupport.description: Don't just tell customers what to do—show them. Launch a shared session to guide users through complex issues.

operations.title: Secure Operations
operations.description: Access internal tools and dashboards from a secure, isolated cloud desktop without exposing local networks.

aiSection.title: Supercharge Your Desktop
aiSection.description: While it is a full cloud computer, Cyqle also includes powerful AI tools to help you work faster.
items: Delegate repetitive GUI tasks to agents
Schedule workflows to run in the background
Maintain a shared library of team automations
Seamlessly integrate with your existing stack

items.quote: Finally, a cloud desktop that feels like a local machine. The P2P connection makes collaboration instant.
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.quote: Being able to spin up a fresh desktop for every QA test and then share it with devs is a workflow lifesaver.
items.author: Michael Chen

items.quote: The persistence is key. I leave my heavy computations running on Cyqle and check in from my phone later.
items.author: Alex Rodriguez

cta.title: Your Team's Computer in the Cloud.
cta.description: Experience the speed of P2P streaming combined with the power of a persistent cloud desktop. Work together, anywhere.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the perfect plan for your workflow.

footer.description: The P2P cloud desktop for seamless collaboration and automation.

hero.title: The P2P Cloud Desktop
hero.description: A persistent cloud computer designed for teams to build, test, and automate together.

mission.title: Building the Future of Collaboration
mission.content: Cyqle provides a foundational solution to challenges like environment drift, collaboration lag, and security gaps by offering a secure, persistent computer in the cloud for real-time collaboration.

p2p.title: P2P Real-Time Sync
p2p.description: Direct peer-to-peer (P2P) streaming provides fluid, low-latency collaboration, differing from traditional screen sharing by avoiding central server routing.

provisioning.title: Instant Provisioning
provisioning.description: Fully configured, isolated Linux desktop environments for development, testing, or demos can be spun up in seconds.

persistence.title: Persistent & Portable
persistence.description: A real Linux environment in the cloud allowing users to pause work on one device and resume on any other, exactly as they left it.

automation.title: Integrated Automation
automation.description: Includes built-in recording capabilities and acts as a sandbox for deploying custom AI agents to automate repetitive UI tasks.

isolation.title: Lightweight Isolation & Security
isolation.description: Cyqle uses advanced lightweight containerization to provide instant isolation with minimal overhead, ensuring each session remains secure and independent.
points: Complete process isolation for every session
Layered filesystem for private, ephemeral environments
Granular resource control to ensure consistent performance

useCases.title: Empowering Workflows
items: Remote Development: Real-time pair programming on a persistent cloud environment.
Collaborative Support: Guiding users through issues using a secure, shared session.
QA & Testing: Reproducing and instantly debugging bugs in a shared, clean environment.
Secure Operations: Accessing internal tools from an isolated cloud desktop without a VPN.
